body: Well quite a cheap plot, it's very lacking overall but the art cover it pretty well.

Awww that was really cute

if albert died or the country were invaded by another country , that's the very reason to start a new saga of the demon queen
Demon King is best girl?

I feel like there is a hidden bad end here. She gets to be the new queen shortly after finding out about her past life as maou-sama. The old Queen didn't look sick, why did she die?
And her eyes change to demonic yellow with the thinly wailed threat of "you'll keep me happy". A good person would care more about others happiness than their own, and as queen she definitely should put her people before herself.
In short we have gotten us into a "God save us from the queen" scenario here

So it seems Anette is the reincarnation of Anon. Anon had placed his soul into Celicia the queen, to be reborn again. But Celicia cleansed Anon of his demonic prowess before giving birth. 

Reincarnation is seen as being reborn as a different person, while retaining potential memories and status from your past life. The demon king seems to always reincarnate as a boy, but the queen cleansing him must have also changed it so that he could be a girl and become a saint instead. 

Anette isn’t two different people. Anette is Anon, who just doesn’t have any memories of his past initially. But when Anette sees the holy sword, her memories of her past lives as Anon came back to her.

It must have been a huge strain on her body, so she passed out. She woke up after her body settled down, and her mind stabilized enough to recollect the multiple lives she lived.

That’s when she tried killing the hero, but having his demonic prowess cleansed, is unable to access her past demonic powers.
